property.name: title
property.label: Title
property.description: Title that displays at the top of the application. If defined, this title will appear at the top of each step. If empty, no application title will be displayed.

property.name: pagePosition
property.label: Title Alignment
property.description: Select the alignment for the title text. Options are: Left, Right and Center.

property.name: username
property.label: Calendar ID
property.description: Enter Google Calendar ID. This can be found in Settings > Integrate Calendar for your Google Calendar.

property.name: cardOn
property.label: Show Border
property.description: Select to display a border around the calendar.

property.name: propTitle
property.label: Show Google Title
property.description: Select to display the title from Google Calendar.

property.name: propNav
property.label: Show Google Nav
property.description: Select to display the navigation bar from Google Calendar.

property.name: propDate
property.label: Show Google Date
property.description: Select to display the date from Google Calendar.

property.name: propPrint
property.label: Show Google Print Icon
property.description: Select to display the print icon from Google Calendar.

property.name: propTabs
property.label: Show Google Tabs
property.description: Select to display tabs from Google Calendar.

property.name: propCalendars
property.label: Show Google Calendar List
property.description: Select to display the Google Calendar List drop-down.

property.name: propTZ
property.label: Show Google Time Zone
property.description: Select to display time zone from Google Calendar.

property.name: mode
property.label: Default View
property.description: Enter your preferred view: Month, Week, Agenda.

property.name: propWeekStart
property.label: Week Start
property.description: Enter the day you would like the week to start on. Options: Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday and Saturday.
